author: Kaia Hubbard
title: JD Vance defends amplifying false claims about immigrants, saying "you're never going to get this stuff perfect" - CBS News
description: On "Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan," Sen. JD Vance condemned the threat of violence in Springfield, Ohio, despite amplifying the false claims.
content: Washington — Sen. JD Vance, the Republican nominee for vice president, on Sunday defended amplifying debunked claims about Haitian immigrants in Springfield, Ohio, while refusing to correct the recor… [+5252 chars]
